description:
Randy is 21 years old and works for the airlines. He's kind of shy and wasn't super talkative on camera. I think the lights and stuff made him nervous.

He told me offline that he's gay and just recently came out to his family and friends.

Randy is cute with his clothes on, but he's fucking hot when he's naked with his ripped, worked-out body!

He gets less shy when he's naked, so I'm guessing he's got some exhibitionist tendencies!

My favorite part about Randy: he's a "squirter."

See how many squirts you can count!
title: Randy
